item.title: CVE-2011-4938|2024-08-07T00:23:39.061Z -- ariadne -- ariadne
item.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Ariadne 2.7.6 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the PATH_INFO parameter to (1) index.php and (2) loader.php.
